Simulation

Class Bus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simulation.Location
      • Simulation.Bus

  • public class Bus
extends Location
    A class representing a bus, which can carry a finite number of people between stations.
    Author:
    Eliot J. Kaplan

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class Simulation.Location

        getPassengers

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()
        Returns:
        The maximum number of people who can fit on this bus.

      • getDestination

        public Station getDestination()
        Returns the station that this bus is on its way towards. If the bus has already arrived and is waiting to be redeployed, this is the bus' current station.
        Returns:
        This bus' destination, or this bus' current location if its arrival time is <= the current time.

      • getStation

        public Station getStation()
        Returns the station that this bus is currently at. If the bus is currently between stations, returns null.
        Returns:
        This bus's current station or null if the bus is between stations.

      • getArrivalTime

        public int getArrivalTime()
        Returns:
        The time in timesteps since the start of the program when this bus will arrive at its destination.

      • getTimeUntilArrival

        public int getTimeUntilArrival()
        Returns:
        The time in timesteps until this bus arrives at its destination. Will be 0 if the bus is currently at a station.

      • atDestination

        public boolean atDestination()
        Tells you if the bus has arrived at its destination. If it has not, you will not be able to issue instructions to it or have passengers get on or off.
        Returns:
        true if the bus is currently at its destination, false otherwise.

      • setDestination

        public boolean setDestination(Station s)
        Tells the bus what station to go to. The bus leaves as soon as you give this command, so after this command you will not be able to have passengers get on and off until the bus gets there. (So make sure that everyone is on the bus who should be BEFORE calling this command.)
        Parameters:
        s - The station to which you want the bus to go.
        Returns:
        true if the command was successfully given, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
